类的使用
org.springframework.web.method.HandlerTypePredicate

  • 使用HandlerTypePredicate的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.method
    Common infrastructure for handler method processing, as used by Spring MVC's org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method package.

    • org.springframework.web.method中HandlerTypePredicate的使用

      返回HandlerTypePredicate的org.springframework.web.method中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      HandlerTypePredicate HandlerTypePredicate.Builder.build() 
      static HandlerTypePredicate HandlerTypePredicate.forAnnotation(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>... annotations)
      Match handlers annotated with a specific annotation.
      static HandlerTypePredicate HandlerTypePredicate.forAnyHandlerType()
      Predicate that applies to any handlers.
      static HandlerTypePredicate HandlerTypePredicate.forAssignableType(java.lang.Class<?>... types)
      Match handlers that are assignable to a given type.
      static HandlerTypePredicate HandlerTypePredicate.forBasePackage(java.lang.String... packages)
      Match handlers declared under a base package, e.g.
      static HandlerTypePredicate HandlerTypePredicate.forBasePackageClass(java.lang.Class<?>... packageClasses)
      Type-safe alternative to forBasePackage(String...) to specify a base package through a class.
